cast.overview: A New York stockbroker refuses to cooperate in a large securities fraud case involving corruption on Wall Street, corporate banking world and mob infiltration. Based on Jordan Belfort's autobiography.
cast.title: The Wolf of Wall Street

details.biography: Chris Riggi was born on September 18, 1985 in New York, USA as Christopher Nicholas Riggi. He is an actor and producer, known for The Wolf of Wall Street (2013), Vampires Suck (2010) and Brotherhood (2008).
details.name: Chris Riggi
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
